aztecs.name: Aztecs
bonuses: Monks gain 5 HP for each researched Monastery technology.
aztecs.tech_tree_notes: Lacks cavalry, gunpowder units, and many high-tier armor upgrades.

britons.name: Britons
bonuses: Town Centers cost -50% wood starting in the Castle Age.
Foot archers (except Skirmishers) have +1 range in Castle Age, +1 in Imperial Age.
britons.tech_tree_notes: Lacks high-tier cavalry and gunpowder units.

jaguar_warrior.name: Jaguar Warrior
jaguar_warrior.description: Infantry unit with a very high attack bonus against other infantry.

longbowman.name: Longbowman
longbowman.description: Foot archer with an exceptionally long range.

militia.name: Militia
militia.description: Basic infantry unit, available in the Dark Age. The foundation of the main infantry line.

archer.name: Archer
archer.description: Basic ranged unit. Effective in numbers against unarmored units but vulnerable to skirmishers and cavalry.

yeomen.name: Yeomen
yeomen.effect: Foot archers gain +1 range and towers gain +2 attack.

fletching.name: Fletching
fletching.effect: Archers, Galleys, Town Centers, Castles, and Towers gain +1 attack and +1 range.

barracks.name: Barracks
barracks.description: Creates and upgrades infantry units like Militia, Spearmen, and Eagles.

castle.name: Castle
castle.description: A powerful defensive structure. Creates the civilization's Unique Unit and Trebuchets.
